Text:
The video quality is much better than all other sources out there, but there are some episodes missing. It starts with the first episode, but after 14 min 18 secs it skips to the middle of episode 3, but from then onward all episodes are complete. You must watch the first three episodes somewhere else, otherwise nothing will make sense!!

It's 560 x 320 resolution but there is some ghosting when objects move in the video, perhaps  codec or the fps was probably not right for the original source or maybe the original source also had this ghosting.
